duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement hospice plan of care in coordination with staff, family, and patients consisting of direct patient care including wound care, vitals, monitoring, medication management.
Educate patients and families on the plan of care and specifics of hospice care.

education_certification.credential: Clear and active RN license in the state of TN
Experience in any of the following settings: Oncology, ER, L&D, ICU, Med/Surge, LTC, acute care, geriatric care, skilled/nursing homes
Comfortable working with those transitioning into the end of life
